cast.name: Ronnie Van Zant Ronnie Van Zant

writer.name: 史蒂芬·卡嘉克 Stephen Kijak

director.name: 史蒂芬·卡嘉克 Stephen Kijak

this_title: If I Leave Here Tomorrow: A Film About Lynyrd Skynyrd
trans_title: 如果我明日即将离去：关于林纳·史金纳
introduction: This authorized documentary will explore the music and backstory of the legendary American band. With the songs from the first six Skynyrd albums driving the narration, the film focuses on the story of frontman Ronnie Van Zant - his upbringing, his roots, his work ethic and his contradictory persona as both as a mythic Southern rock poet and notorious boozed-up brawler, as well as the relationships between his friends and fellow founding members Gary Rossington and Allen Collins, along with later bandmates Ed King and Artimus Pyle.
chinese_title: 如果我明日即将离去：关于林纳·史金纳
foreign_title: If I Leave Here Tomorrow: A Film About Lynyrd Skynyrd
